subject: Re: Shaw Alphabet Books is now online.
msgSnippet: ... How very odd. I don t really know how to explain that. Is your screen set darker than normal? To suit the mood of the first book (or at least what people
messageBody:
--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, Sid Tanaban <sidban2@...> wrote:

> I couldn't read anything - even the fonts.

How very odd. I don't really know how to explain that. Is your screen set darker than normal? To suit the mood of the first book (or at least what people would assume is the mood of the first book), I made the background completely black and the font a greyscaled 9f, so basically a mix of standard grey mixed with white in a 3:1 ratio, which SHOULD show up OK. What browser/version number are all using? If you highlight the page, does the font show up? At the very least, are the pictures showing up for you? Has anyone else been having problems with it? I've just changed the source code slighly by taking the font colour out of the BODY tag and making a separate FONT tag. Does it work OK for you now?
